title: Soraka + Hp Regen changes
body:
I'm slightly confused here. 

They changed the flats to %s, does this also affect runes?
-- i ask because I stack a decent amount of scale/flat Hp/Reg in runes for heals. How does changing to %s affect Soraka? Would this change make my rune page useless now since her base hp/5 is low? 

I used to run around at like 1.7k hp and like 15/hp a second which was really fun.. Is this no longer possible?  Super confusing maths.

replies.body:
This change does not impact runes. Nor does it interact with runes.
The base % regen impacts only the regen you gain from the champion itself. In the item shop, you will see what this actually means calculated out before you purchase.
Awesome. Thanks for clarifying that up for me!

The Patchnotes weren't too clear about this, but the items say % base stat and the champion updates say base stat + growth stat.

Does that mean the items won't get better with level? If they do you may wanna clarify that a bit.

Also the PBE had health changes, but on the Patchlog I only see the mana changes?
I'm curious on why Runes were left out of the change? Was the concern that Runes would become more/less effective (thus increasing/decreasing value per IP spent) based on the selected champion?
After playing a few games with her, it definitely feels like Soraka's regen is way weaker. I even play with full hp regen yellows and quints. Gonna have to do a different build now.
